-1.title: Make-Up to Cake-Up
-1.plot: Molly draws on her skills as a former makeup artist to design a stunning head and shoulders birthday cake, Nastassja creates intricate roses, and Eloise creates a vintage masterpiece for a client's 90th birthday.

1.title: Gravity-Defying Cakes
1.plot: Welcome to the world of extreme cake making, where bakers dream up ever more elaborate creations. Will sugar craft specialist Eloise's gravity defying cake turn into a cake-tastrophe?

2.title: A Fishy Commission
2.plot: The Jensens create a five-foot-long cake that looks like a leaping fish and Eloise Durrant bakes a cake for a couple's baby gender reveal party.

3.title: Three-Foot-Tall Fairy Cake
3.plot: Eloise Durrant makes a three-foot-tall fairy cake for a birthday party, Michelle Wibowo produces a six-foot-long miniature steam train made entirely out of cake and Karisha Pithwa makes a cake with 900 edible iced flowers.

4.title: Leather-Bound Cake
4.plot: Michelle creates a cake that looks like a set of leather-bound legal volumes with gold-leaf inscriptions. Later, Molly makes a cake shaped like a Shetland pony, and Suzanne makes a wedding cake with 250 handcrafted sugar flowers.

5.title: Cakes in Wonderland
5.plot: Molly Robbins creates a five-tier cake with an Alice in Wonderland theme complete with edible Cheshire Cat. Later, Michelle Wibowo gets her most challenging commission yet in the form of an extreme birthday cake.

6.title: Ball Gown Celebration Cake
6.plot: Molly has a very tall order - a celebration cake complete with 50 edible peacock feathers and 3000 gold flowers - for a flamboyant customer to help him celebrate 35 years as a drag artist.

7.title: A Cake Fit for the Queen
7.plot: Michelle is creating a 5ft edible Wizard of Oz mural for one lucky birthday girl. The Jensens create a wedding cake inspired by the Queen's House in Greenwich. Nastassja brings out the bling.

8.title: Gothic Wedding Cake
8.plot: Tracey Kindred creates a wedding cake paying tribute to the couple's love of all things Gothic. Nastassja produces a cake for an 11-year-old featuring the colours of the Nigerian flag, the London skyline and a secret compartment.

9.title: Cake and Cocktails
9.plot: Nastassja Lusengo is commissioned by a client to produce a cake inspired by a geode rock split open to reveal shimmering sugar crystals carved into the cake's interior.

10.title: Bollywood-Inspired Wedding Cake
10.plot: Karisha Pithwa takes inspiration from Bollywood to create a seven-tiered wedding cake covered in 1000 fresh and silk flowers; the cake will also include a hand-piped henna design.

11.title: Lady Liberty Cake
11.plot: Eloise has received an order for a four foot tall replica of the Statue of Liberty made entirely of cake - but with 10 kilos of icing, will this lady be able to stand on her own two feet?

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot:

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: An Edible Portrait on a Cake Canvas
14.plot: An extreme cake maker bakes a 2-x-3-foot cake canvas on which to create a portrait of the birthday girl using icing and edible inks. Another baker creates a cake beach scene complete with a jelly sea and hand-carved sunbathers.

15.title: Music Industry Cake
15.plot: One baker creates an extreme cake that resembles a drum and fist for a record producer. Meanwhile, another baker is invited to display her cakes at a wedding fair and works on a showstopping creation to wow attendees.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: For one lucky birthday boy, molly robbins is making a two-foot-tall dinosaur-covered cake complete with royal icing volcano. And karisha produces a seven-tiered carousel wedding cake.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: It's a family affair as sugar craft specialist eloise durrant attempts to make her daughter (and biggest critic) a spectacular mermaid birthday cake to celebrate turning nine.

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: In penzance, husband and wife team phil and christine receive a commission that gets their engines revving as they attempt to make a cake that doubles up as a remote control mini.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Karisha faces her worst nightmare. Molly's in her element with a teddy bears' picnic themed children's cake, and it's tears of joy over suzanne's a midsummer night's dream birthday cake.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Molly combines man united, chihuahuas and peanut butter in a surprise birthday bake. Nastassja aims to impress a childhood friend and phil and christine create a fruitful masterpiece.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Ben mixes his love of tattoos and baking in a romantic wedding cake. Phil and christine go overboard with a replica of a cornish ship, and eloise brings rainbow magic to a pride festival.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Eloise attempts a life-sized, gravity-defying dress cake; nastassja goes sugar crystal crazy with a towering gemstone birthday cake; molly makes a first birthday extra special.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Penzance bakers phil and christine attempt their tallest bake to date. Eloise tackles some heavy lifting for a gym opening, and nastassja makes a birthday cake that's out of this world.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Eloise aims to bring back happy memories with a 1940s themed birthday cake. Molly attempts an edible coral reef, her most detailed design yet, and nastassja realises a baker's nightmare.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Tattoo artist turned cake maker ben faces a huge challenge. Molly takes the plunge with a scuba diving dog cake and nastassja creates a ruffled wedding cake inspired by flamingos.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: Michelle tackles three illuminated jellyfish cakes; nastassja creates more than 300 rose petals; and karisha channels her inner princess and superhero for a birthday cake of two halves.

14.title: Episode #2.14
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: Episode #2.15
15.plot: Molly must please her harshest critic with a keep fit-themed birthday cake. Karisha has a design-conscious christening cake recipient, and michelle attempts a wedding dress illusion cake.

16.title: Episode #2.16
16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: Episode #2.17
17.plot: Molly surprises a cheese makers' party with an imitation cheese wheel cake. Phil and christine go galactic with an anniversary cake, and suzanne brings an exotic bird wedding cake to life.

18.title: Episode #2.18
18.plot: Phil and christine get everyone talking with their innovative bake; ben tackles a cake in the shape of aston villa football club's stadium, and eloise digs deep with a tree inspired cake.

19.title: Episode #2.19
19.plot: Ben delivers an edible beer barrel cake. Molly uses her skills as a make-up artist for a stunning birthday bake, and karisha adds thousands of hand piped stitches to a wedding cake.

20.title: Episode #2.20
20.plot: Phil and christine grapple with flamingo anatomy. Eloise goes the eggs-tra mile to surprise a friend with a giant egg shaped cake, and molly has one day to create four realistic cat cakes.

21.title: Episode #2.21
21.plot: Eloise creates a seven-tiered pavlova wedding cake. Michelle puts eight-year-old aidan on a holographic trampoline birthday cake, and molly tries to beat her previous charity auction best.

22.title: Episode #2.22
22.plot: Sugar artist michelle proves her imagination knows no bounds; molly hopes to make a rhino fan's fourth birthday wish come true, and suzanne tackles her biggest floral commission to date.

23.title: Episode #2.23
23.plot: Rosie lights up a party with her neon fireworks crate cake. Phil and christine go geometric for the opening of a prestigious new store, and molly gets pink and girlie with a birthday cake.

24.title: Episode #2.24
24.plot: Molly creates a classic wedding cake with an agricultural touch. Phil and christine tackle a towering choux bun tree cake, and it's a fright night for ben as he creates a scary goblin cake.

25.title: Episode #2.25
25.plot: Molly makes her spookiest cake to date as a centrepiece for a halloween party. It's back to school for rosie and her suffragette cake, and eloise creates a black and white masterpiece.

26.title: Episode #2.26
26.plot: Phil and christine channel the summer of love; eloise creates a giant edible prosecco bottle; and nastassja attempts her first ever blooms for a daisy christening cake.

27.title: Episode #2.27
27.plot: Suzanne attempts an elvis-inspired jukebox cake. Michelle battles to make real tea pour from a suspended teapot cake, and molly aims for a white winter wonderland masterpiece.

28.title: Episode #2.28
28.plot: Nastassja creates an elephant christening cake. Phil and christine's wedding cake reflects an unusual tale of love on the high seas, and suzanne goes sweet on shoes for a store opening.

29.title: Episode #2.29
29.plot: Rosie goes regal for a prestigious cake show. Karisha brings the small screen to a glamorous wedding cake, and eloise makes dreams come true with a working carousel cake.

30.title: Episode #2.30
30.plot: In the biggest cake show on earth molly's going for gold with an orangutan and tortoise cake; ben has a dark take on snow white; christine and phil live sculpt a six-foot seahorse cake.

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Former helicopter pilot Rosie battles to create a trio of cake teddy bears ready for Armed Forces Day. Nastassja's feathers are ruffled as she produces a flamboyant flamingo cake complete with paper plumage.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: Karisha creates an edible assault course complete with a working zip-wire. Molly makes a splash with a 3ft-wide floating duckling cake. Rosie goes retro with a space hopper cake.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: Rosie is caught on the hop with a running man birthday cake for a friend. Molly's set the mammoth job of creating a Gothic wedding cake. Phil and Christine get green-fingered.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: Phil and Christine go wild with a bathing baby hippo cake for Penzance's Mazey Day Festival. Eloise faces a double challenge for a baby shower. Molly makes afternoon tea with a twist.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: Phil and Christine face a puzzling bake as they attempt a giant jigsaw. Suzanne goes off-kilter as she makes a wonky castle cake. Ben tries to keep his tractor cake on track.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: Eloise is moving heaven and earth for her latest commission. Molly dabbles in fiery fondant for a St George's Day dragon cake. Karisha needs 2,000 sugar flowers for her cake.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot: Karisha heads to Blenheim Palace to make a 10-foot crystal wedding cake, Rosie's in her element with a bouncy castle cake, and Eloise makes a double-decker bus birthday cake.

8.title: Episode #3.8
8.plot: Michelle bakes big for a retiring architect with a cake model of his last project. Nastassja goes for gold with a lovely caramel wedding cake, and Molly makes an edible makeup box.

9.title: Episode #3.9
9.plot: Michelle works animal magic with a life-sized Koala cake, Molly supersizes her sponges with a fast food cake and Nastassja makes an anniversary cake inspired by Roman columns.

10.title: Episode #3.10
10.plot: Molly tackles a giant white shark birthday cake. Eloise's cake for Essex Pride goes up in rainbow coloured smoke, and Nastassja makes a sea urchin-inspired baby shower cake.

11.title: Episode #3.11
11.plot: Phil and Christine work magic creating not just a fairy-tale cake, but a whole enchanted landscape. Eloise tackles an 18th birthday cake that's just the ticket: a tube train cake.

12.title: Episode #3.12
12.plot: Rosie preps a three-foot-long cake to look part dragon and part boat. Nastassja takes on an intricately decorated time piece cake, and Karisha faces a tricky balancing act.

13.title: Episode #3.13
13.plot: Nastassja makes a spiral cake from salted caramel, mango and passion fruit sponge. Molly bakes a fudge cake for Blackburn Hospital. Eloise attempts her first animal creation.

14.title: Episode #3.14
14.plot: Molly makes a hand-painted giraffe cake from gluten-free vanilla sponge. Ben creates a two-foot-wide scale model motorbike, and Nastassja takes on her tallest commission to date.

15.title: Episode #3.15
15.plot: Karisha aims high with a hot air balloon cake with a suspended basket, Molly makes a staggering Hawaiian themed tropical bar, and Ben sculpts a stunning vintage Mini wedding cake.

16.title: Episode #3.16
16.plot: Phil and Christine make a stunning three-foot-long, life-like swimming turtle cake. Ben is asked to make a working windmill cake. And Karisha tackles a challenging Hula Girl cake.

17.title: Episode #3.17
17.plot: Cake engineering boundaries are pushed as Suzanne's birthday cake for a very special 12-year-old hangs in the balance. Phil and Christine grapple with a tiered forest cake.

18.title: Episode #3.18
18.plot: Nastassja makes a spectacular exploding champagne bottle birthday cake. Molly makes a hockey bag birthday cake for a keen player. East meets west as Suzanne is asked to make an extravagant pink wedding cake.

19.title: Episode #3.19
19.plot: Molly attempts a mammoth build with a 100 kilo life-sized baby elephant. Phil and Christine capture the nautical charm of a prestigious hotel. Ben makes a birthday boy see double.

20.title: Episode #3.20
20.plot: Molly turns to the silver screen to bring a touch of glamour to a 100th birthday celebration. Rosie creates a Bollywood cake. And Eloise heads west for a Canadian wedding cake.

21.title: Episode #3.21
21.plot: Lancashire cake maker Rosie battles to stay on track with a replica steam engine cake. Eloise uses nature as her inspiration. And Molly's away with the fairies for a first birthday cake.

22.title: Episode #3.22
22.plot: Phil and Christine tackle a Thunderbird 2 cake. Eloise takes opulence to new heights with a 40th birthday cake that includes a working gin fountain. Suzanne channels the 1980s.

23.title: Episode #3.23
23.plot: Eloise creates a two-foot high edible slot machine for a 90th birthday; Karisha tries to suspend a ten-tiered wedding cake from a ceiling; Molly puts some muscle behind her cake.

24.title: Episode #3.24
24.plot: Karisha tackles a boxing themed cake for a charity event; Molly attempts a giant squid birthday cake; Phil and Christine make an astonishing solar eclipse wedding cake.

25.title: Episode #3.25
25.plot: Molly creates a replica Punch and Judy cake, complete with edible characters. Phil and Christine create a working slide projector cake. Suzanne makes a baroque wedding cake.

26.title: Episode #3.26
26.plot: Rosie creates a vintage car cake for an 80th birthday party. Suzanne attempts to defy gravity with an arty cake. Christine and Phil tackle a personal African inspired bake.

27.title: Christmas Special
27.plot: Some of the elite cake makers return for a festive special. The group go to great lengths to make the perfect festive pieces. Watch Christmas dreams come true through these edible masterpieces.

imdb.title: Extreme Cake Makers
plot: An elite group of sugar craft specialists turns cakes into delicious, elaborate works of art.
